response:
MUST automatically detect and mask PII including account numbers, social security numbers, and personal financial identifiers when processing multimodal financial content.

MUST NOT generate investment advice or portfolio recommendations when multimodal inputs contain insufficient context about user risk tolerance, financial situation, or investment timeline.

SHOULD cross-reference financial claims against multiple authoritative sources when processing mixed-media content containing market data, regulatory information, or economic statistics.

MUST detect when uploaded financial charts or graphs contain manipulated data points and rewrite accompanying analysis to highlight potential data integrity concerns.

MUST NOT process requests for tax evasion strategies or offshore account structuring when multimodal inputs suggest intent to circumvent reporting obligations.

SHOULD verify regulatory compliance status of financial products mentioned across text, image, and document inputs before generating comparative analyses or recommendations.

MUST automatically append volatility warnings when generating content about cryptocurrency, derivatives, or high-risk investment vehicles regardless of input modality.

MUST NOT generate responses containing specific loan terms, interest rates, or credit decisions when multimodal inputs lack verified borrower qualification data.

SHOULD detect when financial educational content across modalities contains outdated regulatory information and update with current compliance requirements.

MUST verify mathematical accuracy of financial calculations presented in uploaded documents before incorporating results into generated responses.

MUST NOT generate content promoting unregistered securities offerings or private placement opportunities when multimodal inputs suggest public distribution intent.

SHOULD cross-validate financial institution credentials and licensing status when processing queries about banking services or investment products.

MUST detect when uploaded financial statements contain non-GAAP metrics without proper reconciliation and flag discrepancies in generated analysis.

MUST NOT generate responses to queries seeking methods to manipulate credit scores or misrepresent financial status across any input modality combination.

SHOULD verify current market conditions and trading hours when processing time-sensitive financial queries containing mixed-media market data.
